article_title: William Galston: Democrats, It’s Time to Move On
article_text:
Victory has a thousand fathers, President Kennedy famously observed after the Bay of Pigs fiasco; defeat is an orphan. Those were the good old days. Now defeat is attended by bevies of losers demanding that other losers take paternity tests.

For Democrats, the season of recriminations has begun, right on schedule. If only Obama had acted earlier on immigration; if only Harry Reid hadn’t blocked votes on everything that mattered; if...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, William A. Galston writes that Chuck Schumer got it right: Focus on helping the middle class.
twitter.title: Democrats, It’s Time to Move On

article_summary:
For Democrats, the season of recriminations has begun, right on schedule.
Victory has a thousand fathers, President Kennedy famously observed after the Bay of Pigs fiasco; defeat is an orphan.
If only Obama had acted earlier on immigration; if only Harry Reid hadn’t blocked votes on everything that mattered; if...
Now defeat is attended by bevies of losers demanding that other losers take paternity tests.
Those were the good old days.
